footer.text: Built by a world-class senior frontend engineer.

tooltips.monthlyFee: The primary monthly tuition fee charged per child.
tooltips.registrationFee: A one-time fee charged upon a child's enrollment, factored into the first month's revenue for new children.
tooltips.targetChildren: The initial number of children enrolled in the program. This is the baseline for projections.
tooltips.assistantRatio: The maximum number of children one assistant can supervise. A new assistant is automatically hired when this ratio is exceeded.
tooltips.monthlyGrowth: The projected percentage increase in student enrollment each month. Used for the 12-month forecast.
tooltips.rent: The monthly cost for the physical space or facility.
tooltips.utilities: Estimated monthly costs for electricity, water, internet, etc.
tooltips.insurance: The monthly insurance premium for the business.
tooltips.otherCosts: Any other recurring monthly costs (e.g., software, cleaning services, subscriptions).
tooltips.assistantSalary: The gross monthly salary for one full-time assistant.
tooltips.materialsPerChild: The estimated monthly cost for consumable materials per child (e.g., art supplies, worksheets).
tooltips.snacksPerChild: The estimated monthly cost of snacks and food per child.
tooltips.birthdaysPerMonth: The average number of birthday parties hosted on weekends per month.
tooltips.revenuePerBirthday: The average revenue generated from a single birthday party event.
tooltips.adultWorkshopFee: The admission fee per person for special workshops or classes for adults.
tooltips.adultsPerWorkshop: The average number of adults attending a single workshop.
tooltips.merchandiseSales: Total monthly sales amount from merchandise like toys or t-shirts.
tooltips.merchandiseProfitMargin: The percentage of merchandise sales that is profit. The rest is considered cost of goods sold.
tooltips.startupCosts: The total one-time costs to start the business (e.g., furniture, deposits, licenses). This is used to calculate ROI.

breakEven.title: Break-Even Point
breakEven.description: Children needed to cover all costs.

annualProfit.title: Annual Projected Profit
annualProfit.description: Total profit after 12 months (before startup costs).

roi.title: Return on Investment (ROI)
roi.description: Annual profit as % of startup costs.
